Summary: alot of bright lights, no sound,
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend had just left my house and called me on my cell and told me to come outside and look south there was something strange . I went out in my driveway and saw a object with 2 bright lights with a smaller yellow light in the center. My friend by this time was out of his car and we were watching this thing. It was not going very fast, as it got closer we could then see all the lights so we knew it wasn't a plane or anything that we have seen before.He has a picture that he took with phone, it was a little ways away by the time he thought of getting a picture, but you can see the shape and lights.It did not make any sound.
